trans-unit.source: Defines the SOAP fault codes that appear in a SOAP message when an error occurs while communicating with XML Web services using the SOAP version 1.2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: Define los códigos de error SOAP que aparecen en un mensaje SOAP cuando se produce un error al establecer comunicación con servicios Web XML mediante el protocolo de la versión 1.2 de SOAP.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP fault in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Un error de SOAP en la versión 1.2 de la especificación SOAP contiene un `Code` elemento y entre otras cosas, un opcional `Subcode` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element is one of a pre-defined set of codes that informs a recipient that the cause of the error fell into one of five large error categories.
trans-unit.target: El `Code` elemento es parte de un conjunto predefinido de códigos que informa a un destinatario que no ha llegado la causa del error en una de las cinco categorías de error de gran tamaño.

trans-unit.source: Those five fault codes are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> fields.
trans-unit.target: Los códigos de error de cinco se representan mediante la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, y <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> campos.

trans-unit.source: The `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application-specific error code.
trans-unit.target: El `Subcode` elemento permite al remitente del error de SOAP proporcionar un código de error específica de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET defines four such codes that are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIdFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> fields.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET define cuatro códigos que están representados por la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIdFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, y <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> campos.

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service throwing an exception sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property, which represents the `Code` element, when a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Un servicio Web XML que se produzca una excepción conjuntos el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad, que representa el `Code` elemento, cuando una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> se crea la clase.

trans-unit.source: That error is transmitted over the wire as a SOAP fault, which a .NET Framework client can catch as a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.
trans-unit.target: Que el error se transmite a través de la conexión como un error de SOAP que un cliente de .NET Framework puede detectar como un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="DataEncodingUnknown" /> fault code indicating the SOAP message is encoded in an unrecognized format.
trans-unit.target: Representa el código de error <see langword="DataEncodingUnknown" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP, que indica que el mensaje SOAP está codificado en un formato desconocido.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET no se inicia automáticamente una <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> con el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the fault code for missing ID in SOAP encoding data.
trans-unit.target: Representa el código de error de ausencia de identificadores en los datos de codificación SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="enc:UntypedValue" /> fault subcode indicating that the SOAP message was RPC-encoded and the type name property of an encoded graph node was not specified.
trans-unit.target: Representa el subcódigo de error <see langword="enc:UntypedValue" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que el mensaje SOAP está codificado en RPC y que no se ha especificado la propiedad de nombre de tipo de un nodo gráfico codificado.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET no se inicia automáticamente una <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> con el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> clase tiene un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> propiedad de tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> que representa el subcódigo de error SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad representa el URI para el subcódigo de error SOAP real.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, establezca el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> fault code indicating a SOAP header marked with the <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> attribute was not processed.
trans-unit.target: Representa el código de error <see langword="MustUnderstand" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que no se ha procesado un encabezado SOAP marcado con el atributo <see langword="MustUnderstand" />.

trans-unit.source: Not all SOAP headers require processing by the recipient.
trans-unit.target: No todos los encabezados SOAP requieren un procesamiento por parte del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: However, if a SOAP header is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to "true", processing is required.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, si un encabezado SOAP se marca con el `MustUnderstand` atributo igual a "true", procesamiento es necesario.

trans-unit.source: Failure to process the header when it resides within a SOAP 1.2 request generates a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Error al procesar el encabezado al que se encuentra en una solicitud SOAP 1.2 genera un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> con el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If the SOAP request resided within a SOAP 1.1 request, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si la solicitud SOAP residía en una solicitud SOAP 1.1, la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad está establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault codes differing only by the version of the SOAP protocol used to send the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 y 1.2 definen `MustUnderstand` códigos de error SOAP que se diferencian solo en la versión del protocolo SOAP utilizan para enviar el mensaje SOAP.

trans-unit.source: This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, and the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Este campo representa la versión de SOAP 1.2 y la versión 1.1 de SOAP se representa mediante <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either one of the fault codes by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Los dos campos se asignan a distintos nombres completos, pero puede comprobar si la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad corresponde a uno de los códigos de error mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="Receiver" /> fault code indicating an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server due to a problem with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Representa el código de error <see langword="Receiver" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que se ha producido un error durante el procesamiento de una llamada del cliente en el servidor debido a un problema con el destinatario.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode> when a server is called and it could not respond to a request due to network problems.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> se produce con la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode> cuando se llama a un servidor y no pudo responder a una solicitud debido a problemas de red.

trans-unit.source: Typically, with this type of exception, the client call may succeed later.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, con este tipo de excepción, la llamada del cliente puede realizarse correctamente más tarde.

trans-unit.source: The `Receiver` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Server` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode> field, but the `Server` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: El `Receiver` código de error SOAP es similar a la `Server` error de código, que se representa mediante el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode> campo, pero la `Server` código de error se utiliza cuando la solicitud SOAP se envía a través de SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Receiver` or `Server` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para comprobar si la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad sea la `Receiver` o `Server` códigos de error SOAP, llame a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="rpc:BadArguments" /> fault subcode indicating that arguments sent to the XML Web service method were incorrect or could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: Representa el subcódigo de error <see langword="rpc:BadArguments" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que los argumentos enviados al método de servicios Web XML eran incorrectos o no se pudieron analizar.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET no se inicia automáticamente una <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> con el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> clase tiene un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> propiedad de tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> que representa el subcódigo de error SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad representa el URI para el subcódigo de error SOAP real.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, establezca el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" /> fault subcode indicating the XML Web service does not support the requested XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Representa el subcódigo de error <see langword="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que el servicio Web XML no admite el método de servicios Web XML solicitado.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET no se inicia automáticamente una <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> con el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> clase tiene un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> propiedad de tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode> que representa el subcódigo de error SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad representa el URI para el subcódigo de error SOAP real.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, establezca el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="Sender" /> fault code indicating a client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information.
trans-unit.target: Especifica un código de error <see langword="Sender" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que una llamada de cliente no tenía el formato correcto o no contenía la información adecuada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> when a SOAP 1.2 request is malformed or a parameter is missing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> se produce con la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> cuando una solicitud SOAP 1.2 es incorrecta o un parámetro no está.

trans-unit.source: The `Sender` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Client` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode> field, but the `Client` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: El `Sender` código de error SOAP es similar a la `Client` error de código, que se representa mediante el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode> campo, pero la `Client` código de error se utiliza cuando la solicitud SOAP se envía a través de SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Sender` or `Client` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para comprobar si la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad sea la `Sender` o `Client` códigos de error SOAP, llame a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <see langword="VersionMismatch" /> fault code indicating the XML Web service expected SOAP messages conforming to the SOAP 1.2 specification, yet received one conforming to SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Representa el código de error <see langword="VersionMismatch" /> de la versión 1.2 de SOAP que indica que el servicio Web XML esperaba mensajes SOAP compatibles con la especificación SOAP 1.2, aunque el que se recibió era compatible con SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> when an XML Web service is configured to only accept SOAP 1.2 requests and it receives a SOAP 1.1 message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> se produce con la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> cuando un servicio Web XML está configurado para aceptar sólo solicitudes SOAP 1.2 y recibe un mensaje de SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if an XML Web service is configured to accept only SOAP 1.1 messages and it receives a SOAP 1.2 message, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Del mismo modo, si un servicio Web XML está configurado Aceptar solo SOAP 1.1 mensajes y recibe un mensaje de SOAP 1.2, un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> se produce con la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.VersionMismatchFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For details on configuring XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconConfigurationOptionsForASPNETWebServices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de cómo configurar los servicios Web XML, vea [ [ \<topic://cpconConfigurationOptionsForASPNETWebServices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b).

trans-unit.source: Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `VersionMismatch` SOAP fault codes that differ on the version of the SOAP protocol expected.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 y 1.2 definen `VersionMismatch` códigos de error SOAP que se diferencian en la versión del protocolo SOAP esperado.

trans-unit.source: This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, whereas the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.VersionMismatchFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Este campo representa la versión de SOAP 1.2, mientras que la versión 1.1 de SOAP se representa mediante <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.VersionMismatchFaultCode>.

trans-unit.source: The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either one of the fault codes by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsVersionMismatchFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Los dos campos se asignan a distintos nombres completos, pero puede comprobar si la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> propiedad corresponde a uno de los códigos de error mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsVersionMismatchFaultCode%2A> método.
